column5: Noticed there is a float rod in BPS wiht NFC label on it & wonder if it uses the blank on NFC's website?
What did it say on it?  They make a 13 and 13'6 if I'm not mistaken..  Dunno anyone that's taken the plunge on one yet though.
How much? And what does NFC mean?
North Fork Composites.   Gary Loomis' new company...
Thanks Bill. Will have a look, when Im down there again.
It's not the north fork composites blank, its the 13 foot Tfo rod. Gary has made a signature series with temple fork outfitters. It's a noodle to me.
Thanks. Gabe.  Guess I will have to wait for some time.
So after 2 months you finally decided to say something Gabes.
the one in their catalogue is 13ft and features SIC guides and a fixed reel seat for 149.00 cant beat the price, guides are easily over 100.00 alone
Not a fix seat guy like have mentioned before,but for that price,worth a try.
